TopicTitle: What do you think about Ignore no More android app?

Articles.Content:
http://www.forbes.com/sites/amitchowdhry/2014/08/20/the-ignore-no-more-app-forces-kids-to-call-back-their-parents/

I have mixed feelings, this app was created by a mother who was upset that her son does not take calls from her, in my opinion that sound little a bit like control freak for me But on other hand, when you live under parents roof you need respect like it or no, but on other hand this application can be used by control freak bosses or spouses

Not much to say, as this app is aimed for certain people only.People who don't need it won't be downloading it.

By the way, the link takes to the home page of the website.
It will help kids understanding things about their phones as they try to hack the app. BTW: Any remote controll app is a huge security threat if not done correctly...

It will help kids understanding things about their phones as they try to hack the app. BTW: Any remote controll app is a huge security threat if not done correctly...
